name: Crustacean Castle!
description:
Welcome to Crustacean Castle!  What is this?

 Crustacean Castle is a game I made for Hackington's "Summer Simulation" Game am.  Your job is to protect Calamus the Fish from certain doom by the robo-crabs. Using a cannon, blast the crabs to keep Calamus safe for as long as you can. 

Let me know how long you were able to survive for in the comments! Good luck! Credits! 

Fish model by dion.manganiello

Crab modeled and rigged by Crimson-Heaven

Main game song: Crab Rave 8-Bit by 8  Bit Universe

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=arN6WFqCjgw

Secret mode song: Nightmare King from Hollow Knight

Various sound effects used from Undertale and Hollow Knight.
